content: Why do random people have the ability to archive our paper docs? Is that just considered yet another edit ?
It's because Dropbox paper only has one permission level as far as I know (or at least we've all been given the same one)
And all documents show up in the same place
So someone trying to get organized might accidentally archive something thinking that they've only done it for themselves, not everyone
arguably we should switch to google docs but paper is .. so ... nice ..
